parameters.name: DatabaseId
parameters.description:
The ID of the database that you want to delete.

> You can call the [ListDatabases](~~2758822~~) operation to query the database ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host from which you want to delete the database.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
